channel.title: My Latest Server - UPDATED 20TH NOVEMBER - New Friendly Death + New Veng! -
channel.description:
[size=40pt]AMFG NOW RELEASED IN DOWNLOADS SECTION: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,411633.msg3035954.html[/size]
[b]Building on jinrakes old PvP server ive decided to create a new server. And, as it is extremely glitchy im going to have to do alot of bug fixes, but i think it will be worth it when its released.
Im adding 100% vengeance, GS specials, attacks and movements and much more addons to make it more interesting and MUCH better than the original base.[/b]
[b][size=15pt][font=Algerian]_-_-Latest Update: NO DEATH-_-_[/font][/size][/b]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/9u12s2.gif[/img]
[b]What this does:[/b] Instead of doing that horrible blocky death emote you just teleport home, Sending the message "you drop all your items to make a hasty escape" and lets the other player collect those items
[b]Advantages of this:[/b] Stops all glitches where players are invisible upon respawn. Makes it a more friendly eviroment :o Stops any pvp-nonpvp attacking glitches! as the tele stops them atting :D!
[b][size=15pt][font=Algerian]_-_-INSTANT DDS SPEC-_-_[/font][/size][/b] Instead of the DDS hitting 20....10 it now hits 20,10 - making it much stronger in pking terms.
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/1109e36.gif[/img]
[b][size=15pt][font=Algerian]_-_-Full GS Making.-_-_[/font][/size][/b]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/29vdyfb.gif[/img]
[b][size=15pt][font=Algerian]_-_-FUNKY NEW VENG-_-_[/font][/size][/b]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/f2j3uo.gif[/img] [b][size=15pt][font=Algerian]_-_-Features-_-_[/font][/size][/b]
100% full PvP world with [b]levels changing as you move further north.[/b]
100% [b]PvP point system with store.[/b]
PvP point system generates the amount of points your rewarded [b]dependant on your items and who youve killed.[/b]
Full [b]teleporting system when talking to NPC's[/b]
Edited [b]Characters and NPC's so they are 508 on 317[/b]
100% [b]Godsword making with pieces[/b]
100% All [b]godswords with new specials[/b]
100% [b]Godsword walking running[/b] and all the other stuff CJ had
Fixed the [b]bug where the skull when entering the bank stayed there.[/b]
Added only [b]the most realistic customs[/b]
[b][size=15pt][font=Algerian]_-_-Improvements-_-_[/font][/size][/b]
Change the levels so [b]the maximum it changes to is 126 and the min is 0.[/b]
[b]Edit the shopping area[/b] and all the delta shops
Going to try and[b] add 508 areas and objects[/b]
Add [b]508 vengeance[/b]
Edit [b]all item.java so all items go in the correct slot
Change training.[/b]
[b][size=15pt][font=Algerian]_-_-Pictures-_-_[/font][/size][/b]
Only the best customs. All 100% Ints. [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/25fq6nc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/efkljt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/sgjuz6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/inbv53.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/1253nlx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/mmc004.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/dqkxg7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/dr9rac.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2n6rtpi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/ff5ulv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/mcub68.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/1zd3bx5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2s7ay2t.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2iij3og.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/vo0mpt.png[/img]
[b]If your going to say something pointlesly negative then dont say anything at all. Im here for suggestions not fools looking for a troll.[/b]e
